title: I didn't think they could make Shaco less reliable
body:
But then they gave him a passive where it makes him guranteed to do less damage than attacking them normally unless you have 0 crit items or you're AP.

Edit: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/RvYrEXU6-shacos-rework-killed-ad-assassin-shaco
